response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Considering its unparalleled quality and functionality, I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself who appreciates the finer things. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $8,500. This is an opportunity to acquire something truly special at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 8500}
